title: IS_RAW_KEY_UP
content:
0x36F4E505// IsRawKeyUp
BOOL IS_RAW_KEY_UP(int rawKeyIndex);Parameters:rawKeyIndex: Index of raw key from keyboard.Returns: Returns bool value of up state.Gets if the specified rawKeyIndex is up  on the keyboard.This will not be triggered if the key is disabled with DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAMEVirtual key codes can be found hereExamples:Luaif IsRawKeyUp(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar is up")
end
codeBlocks:
if IsRawKeyUp(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar is up")
end
